original_text: Festus said, ‘King Agrippa, and everyone here today, listen to me! You see this man who is standing in front of you. Many Jews in Jerusalem, and also Jews here in Caesarea, have spoken to me about him. They say very loudly, “This man has done very bad things. He should not continue to live!”
korean_text: 베스도가 말하되 아그립바 왕과 여기 같이 있는 여러분이여 당신들이 보는 이 사람은 유대의 모든 무리가 크게 외치되 살려 두지 못할 사람이라고 하여 예루살렘에서와 여기서도 내게 청원하였으나

sentences.original_text: King Agrippa, and everyone here today
sentences.korean_translation: 아그립바 왕과 오늘 여기 있는 모든 분들

sentences.original_text: who is standing in front of you
and also Jews here in Caesarea
have spoken to me about him
This man has done very bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람이 아주 나쁜 일들을 했다

sentences.original_text: He should not continue to live!
